mapper.select:
select count(*) from dds_mail_conf where is_deleted = 0 and 1=1
and id = #{queryId}
and send_mail like '%${sendto}%'
and is_avild = #{isAvild}
and subject like '%${subject}%'
and rule_id_list like '%${ruleIdStr}%'
and crontab like "%* ?%" and crontab not like "%* * ?%"
and crontab like '%? *%'
and crontab like '%* * ?%'
and crontab like "%?" and crontab not like "%* ?"

select
from dds_mail_conf where is_deleted = 0 and 1=1
and id = #{queryId}
and send_mail like '%${sendto}%'
and is_avild = #{isAvild}
and subject like '%${subject}%'
and rule_id_list like '%${ruleIdStr}%'
and crontab like "%* ?%" and crontab not like "%* * ?%"
and crontab like '%? *%'
and crontab like '%* * ?%'
and crontab like "%?" and crontab not like "%* ?"
limit ${start},${limit}
